about_the_game:
No Running No Life
Maguro Macho Adventure is a 2D action game where you play as "Maguro Macho" a tuna with a bodybuilder's body attached to it.
One day, "Magro Macho" loses contact with his friend "Salmon Macho". Then "Magro Macho" thought, "My friend has been kidnapped by poachers! "
"Magro Macho" thought, "My friend has been kidnapped by poachers! He had heard rumors that poachers had recently become more active in the area. "Magro Macho" runs around the world to rescue his friend.
However, "Magro Macho" cannot stop, because he is a tuna! Because he is a tuna. A tuna will die if he stops! Therefore, you must keep running without stopping until you reach the goal!
Come on! Let's run forever!

Maguro Macho Adventure is a side-scrolling action game that forces you to move.
"Magro Macho" must keep running to clear the stage and to take in oxygen!
If he stops walking, that is his death.
To save his best friend, he must cross mountains and valleys to defeat the boss!

Along the way, "Maguro Macho"'s friends will supply you with supplies. Don't neglect to collect coins along the way, as you will be charged for them!

The game is completed when all 5 stages are conquered. Play with ease and clear the game quickly and easily!

However, "Magro Macho" cannot stop, because he is a tuna! Because he is a tuna. A tuna will die if he stops! Therefore, you must keep running without stopping until you reach the goal!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: Core i7-8700
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX1070
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: Core i7-8700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX4060ti
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
